title: 1Password 5.3 [k'ed]
description:
1Password creates strong, unique passwords for every site, remembers them all for you, and logs you in with a single click. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the best way to stay secure and the fastest way to use the web.

1Password is listed by Apple as a Mac App Store Best of 2014, a 2014 Hall of Famer at iMore, and a Mac|Life EditorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Choice. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Loved and used by millions. Try 1Password today!

STAY SECURE WITH 1PASSWORD

Every day there are new passwords to remember. If you create new ones, they are often forgotten. If you use the same passwords over and over again, you become vulnerable. 1Password solves all these problems.

Ã¢â€”â€  Create strong, unique passwords for every site
Ã¢â€”â€  Secure your data behind a single Master Password
Ã¢â€”â€  Protect yourself with tamper-proof Authenticated 256-bit AES Encryption
Ã¢â€”â€  Auto-Lock keeps your data protected even if your Mac is lost or stolen
Ã¢â€”â€  Use Security Audit to make your passwords stronger
Ã¢â€”â€  **NEW** Create One-Time Passwords for over 75 services with a single click


BE MORE PRODUCTIVE WITH 1PASSWORD

1Password not only keeps you secure with strong and unique passwords, it also makes you more productive.

Ã¢â€”â€  Automatically log into websites using your favorite browsers
Ã¢â€”â€  Fill credit cards and signup forms with a single click
Ã¢â€”â€  Quickly access your data from anywhere using 1Password mini
Ã¢â€”â€  Open websites and automatically submit login information using Go & Fill bookmarks
Ã¢â€”â€  Never again waste time on forgotten passwords
Ã¢â€”â€  **NEW** Start calls and draft emails with a single click

PROTECT MORE THAN JUST PASSWORDS

1Password allows you to store a lot more than just website logins. Keep all your important information available at your fingertips.

Ã¢â€”â€  Store Credit Cards, Secure Notes, Passports, Bank Accounts, and much more
Ã¢â€”â€  Easily remember website Security Questions and generate secure answers
Ã¢â€”â€  Securely store documents and images
Ã¢â€”â€  Never leave home without your important information again
Ã¢â€”â€  **NEW** Add your own custom fields to store whatever you want


EVERY DEVICE HAS EVERY LOGIN

1Password supports all your favorite devices. Keep your critical information with you wherever you go.

Ã¢â€”â€  iCloud support means secure sync with Apple simplicity
Ã¢â€”â€  Dropbox support provides cross-platform sync and sharing
Ã¢â€”â€  Wi-Fi Sync so your vault, even multiple vaults, never leaves your network


SECURELY SHARE WITH FAMILY OR TEAM MEMBERS

1Password allows you to organize your data into multiple vaults and securely share them with others. Use separate vaults to choose what you share and who you share it with.

Ã¢â€”â€  Share business logins with your co-workers
Ã¢â€”â€  Create a family vault to share with your spouse
Ã¢â€”â€  Distribute encryption keys with your development team
Ã¢â€”â€  Exchange accounts and documents with your clients
Ã¢â€”â€  Relieve the burden of estate planning for your loved ones

The possibilities are endless! Best of all you can securely sync your vaults so everyone always has the latest information.


AND MUCH MUCH MORE

Ã¢â€”â€  Built for OS X Yosemite
Ã¢â€”â€  Mark your most used items as Favorites
Ã¢â€”â€  Organize your data with Folders and Tags
Ã¢â€”â€  Save powerful searches as Smart Folders
Ã¢â€”â€  No subscription or other fees
Ã¢â€”â€  Available in many languages
Ã¢â€”â€  Free support from a world-class Customer Support team

What's New in Version 5.3

The Bionic Edition

This release is all about making 1Password for Mac better, faster and stronger. We've added two-step verification, the ability to call and email with a single click and given some existing features a big power-up! Meet 1Password 5.3, the bionic edition.

Two-steps stronger
Time-Based One-Time Passwords for two-step verification are here! Check out http://1pw.ca/TOTPdoc to learn more and get your TOTP on. Bonus: if you own Pro features in 1Password for iOS, your one-time passwords will sync!

Faster communication
Ã¢â€”â€  Start a FaceTime Audio or Skype call. From 1Password. Simply by clicking numbers stored in Identities.
(if there was a Ã¢â‚¬Å“head explodeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ emoji, and if Apple allowed emoji in App Store descriptions, imagine it here.)
Ã¢â€”â€  Ditto for sending emails from addresses in Software Licenses.

+5 power bonus to customization
Ã¢â€”â€  Custom Fields bonanza!
Ã¢â€”â€  We added even more Custom Field types, including URL, email, address, One-Time Passwords, date, and month/year.
Ã¢â€”â€  Secure Notes are now even more versatile: you can add sections and custom fields.

Better date handling
Our developers spent a lot of time fine-tuning 1Password's date handling so that you can traverse the globe without worrying about your passport's expiry date. But seriously, we're really sorry about the date issues. We think we fixed them all, and we have a blog post coming with more information about this issue.

And a better brain
Ã¢â€”â€  Re-designed the Brain for faster, more accurate filling on websites. The heart was just fine, thanks for asking.
Ã¢â€”â€  Improved Credit Card and Identity filling on several sites, including Hilton, Cineplex, Drafthouse, Amazon, and PayPal.
Ã¢â€”â€  The 1Password mini icon has been refined.
Ã¢â€”â€  Improved searching so that you don't need exact matches for accented characters.
Ã¢â€”â€  Added support for new languages and updated translations.
Ã¢â€”â€  Added wildcard support for ignored URLs in autosave.

Compatibility: OS X 10.10 or later, 64-bit processor
